title: Human Name
description: Name of a human or other living entity - parts and usage.(This datatype is created as per HL7 FHIR Release 5 specifications)

fhir:use.title: Use
fhir:use.description: usual | official | temp | nickname | anonymous | old | maiden

fhir:text.title: Text
fhir:text.description: Text representation of the full name

fhir:given.title: Given
fhir:given.description: Given names (not always 'first'). Includes middle names

fhir:prefix.title: Prefix
fhir:prefix.description: Parts that come before the name

fhir:suffix.title: Prefix
fhir:suffix.description: Parts that come after the name

fhir:period.title: Period
fhir:period.description: Time period when name was/is in use.
